One of my favorite games of all time. Awesome atmosphere. Great to play with friends.

Tapping into the zombie craze as it was entering the peak of its resurgence, Valve and Turtle Rock delivered a simple but tightly designed coop shooter that's all zombie killer with minimal filler, while Valve‚Äôs trademark worldbuilding, characters, and dark humor rightly elevates the experience to a classic. While Left 4 Dead 2 has long eclipsed this game in terms of content and community (even including this game's maps), I'm still more fond of L4D's consistent atmosphere and tighter gameplay.
